DOC.brief_summary: This study examine anaesthetic technique affect ECT outcome . Specifically , investigator examine : 1 ) time interval anaesthetic ECT stimulus , 2 ) ventilation rate ECT stimulus , impact quality EEG ( record brain activity ECT use judge quality seizure guide individual patient dose ) .
DOC.brief_title: Understanding How Anaesthesia Affects ECT Outcomes
DOC.detailed_description: This study aim examine time interval administration anaesthetic agent ECT stimulus delivery impact upon measure EEG quality ( seizure quality ) .
DOC.criteria: Patients treat course ECT Use nonstandard anaesthetic agent ECT ( e.g . ketamine )
